ext_descriptions.ext_description: An External_item_identification is a type of External_source_identification that provides the identifier of an item in the context of an external source where it can be found.

the identifier of the external item, in its external context.
For a digital file, the file name of a file in the directory where it is located is an example of external_id.
For a book, the external_id could be the ISBN number.

An External_source_identification is the identification of the source where an item, that is not fully represented in a population of instances of EXPRESS entity data types but is only referred to, or the components of such an item, can be found.
For a digital file identified by a filename and directory path, the source_id is the directory path.
a text that provides further information about the external identification. The value of this attribute need not be specified.
the text that identifies the context in which the external_id is specified.
the external_identification_item whose source is identified.
